document.full_text: a three-day offensive by afghan and foreign forces has killed at least 60 insurgents in a relatively peaceful northwestern afghan province, the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) said.
document.title: afghan, foreign troops kill more than 60 insurgents: nato force
lines_and_colors: a three-day offensive by afghan and foreign forces has killed at least 60 insurgents in a relatively peaceful northwestern afghan province, the nato-led international security assistance force (isaf) said.
